summary: Memorandum for the record regarding a meeting with Dr. MIRO Cardona on 6 October 1961. Topics discussed include propaganda efforts, underground activities, commando action plans, requests for arms, information on arms received by the Castro regime, a proposal for the Council to establish a government on Cuban soil, views on judges and lawyers, members of the Revolutionary Council, the probable Argentine rupture of relations with Cuba, MIRO's attendance at a homage for LACERDA, organization of the Propaganda Commission, MIRO's views on potential leaders of a provisional government, offices of the Council, coordination of exile group activities, and a telephone conversation with MIRO.
title: Meeting with Dr. MIRO Cardona on 6 October
